alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:48AM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts possible over the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Prescott, Seligman, Valle and Williams. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Doney Park 3 to 5 inches Flagstaff 5 to 9 inches Forest Lakes 8 to 12 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches Prescott 4 to 6 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Valle 3 to 5 inches Williams 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
